parameters.name: ByPassSp
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to skip the order lifecycle. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

>  To use this feature, you must contact your account manager.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: PhysicalConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the Express Connect circuit.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region where the Express Connect circuit is deployed.

You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.
